summary.span: 提供将 XPS 文档写到数据存储或打印队列的类。

span.span: Provides classes that write XPS documents to a data store or print queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供和输出的方法[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文档到数据存储区或打印队列。The class provides the and methods that output [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] documents to a data store or print queue. 不同的组的写方法提供不同的内容类型，包括， ， ， ，和。Separate groups of write methods are provided for different content types including , , , , and . 方法使你能够还包括文档，以及传递到个处理程序的附加信息与， ，和事件。The methods enable you to also include a with the document, plus pass additional information to the handlers of the , , and events. 有关详细信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]请参阅 XML 纸张规范 (XPS) 下载[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
